overview: Venomous Vixens, Voodoo priests, and sex-crazed beasts are just some of the insanity you'll witness in this compilation of trailers from mad man director James Balsamo. Let your mind bend and melt after watching one crazy trailer after another in this feature-length compilation of chaos. Never have some many trailers of James Balsamo been caged together in one film... till now! You’ll scream, you’ll moan, you’ll see monsters overgrown in “Trailers Of James Balsamo”
title: Trailers of James Balsamo
